thread.title: How long will it take to repair my tainted Volkswagen?
thread.title_full: How long will it take to repair my tainted Volkswagen? - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kathleen Pender
title: How long will it take to repair my tainted Volkswagen?
text:
Photo: Nick Ut / Nick Ut / Associated Press In this September photo, a 2013 Volkswagen Passat with a diesel engine is evaluated at the California Air Resources Board emissions test lab in El Monte, Calif. In this September photo, a 2013 Volkswagen Passat with a diesel...
Some people driving newer-model Volkswagen and Audi diesel cars equipped with defeat devices could get them repaired early next year. But it could be “one or two years minimum” before all the U.S. vehicles equipped with the emissions-tricking software have been modified, Volkswagen’s U.S. chief Michael Horn told lawmakers Thursday. In this September photo, a 2013 Volkswagen Passat with a diesel engine is evaluated at the California Air Resources Board emissions test lab in El Monte, Calif. In this September photo, a 2013 Volkswagen Passat with a diesel...
Some people driving newer-model Volkswagen and Audi diesel cars equipped with defeat devices could get them repaired early next year. But it could be “one or two years minimum” before all the U.S. vehicles equipped with the emissions-tricking software have been modified, Volkswagen’s U.S. chief Michael Horn told lawmakers Thursday.
